pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.11: Following this, the Pali reads (Dutiya) Pattavagga, “the (second) subchapter on almsbowls”, to indicate the last subchapter of nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the nuns, and then Pariṇatasikkhāpada, “the training rule on diverting an offering intended for the Sangha”, to indicate the last rule in the chapter of nissaggiya pācittiya rules. These indications are redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the monks.
